CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISBLANK(DesiredCondition__r.MoveDesiredDate__c),ISBLANK(DesiredCondition__r.CorporateHousingMoveDesiredDate2__c)), TEXT( DesiredCondition__r.MoveDesiredDate__c) + TEXT( DesiredCondition__r.CorporateHousingMoveDesiredDate2__c ), TEXT( DesiredCondition__r.MoveDesiredDate__c) + "," + TEXT( DesiredCondition__r.CorporateHousingMoveDesiredDate2__c ))
CustomField.label: 入居予定日
